value.latex:
Soient ${u,v} : {\R} \to {\R}$ deux fonctions telles que :
$\begin{cases}\forall\ x \in \R,\ u(x) \ne v(x) \cr
        \lim_{x\to0}u(x) = \lim_{x\to0}v(x) = a > 0.\cr\end{cases}$
value.html: Soient \({u,v} : {\R} \to {\R}\) deux fonctions telles que : \(\begin{cases}\forall\ x \in \R,\ u(x) \ne v(x) \cr \lim_{x\to0}u(x) = \lim_{x\to0}v(x) = a > 0.\cr\end{cases}\)

value.latex:
AF $ \Rightarrow  \exists\ w(x)$ compris entre $u(x)$ et $v(x)$ tel que
    $\frac {u^v - v^v}{u - v} = vw^{v-1} \to a^a$.
value.html: AF \(\Rightarrow \exists\ w(x)\) compris entre \(u(x)\) et \(v(x)\) tel que \(\frac {u^v - v^v}{u - v} = vw^{v-1} \to a^a\).

value.latex:
$u^v - v^u = (u^v - v^v) + (v^v - v^u) = (u-v)(vw_1^{v-1} - (\ln v)v^{w_2})$

    $u^u - v^v = (u-v)w_3^{w_3}(1 + \ln w_2)$

    $ \Rightarrow  \lim = \frac {1-\ln a}{1 + \ln a}$.
value.html:
\(u^v - v^u = (u^v - v^v) + (v^v - v^u) = (u-v)(vw_1^{v-1} - (\ln v)v^{w_2})\)

\(u^u - v^v = (u-v)w_3^{w_3}(1 + \ln w_2)\)

\(\Rightarrow \lim = \frac {1-\ln a}{1 + \ln a}\).
